segments.text: Do you have any plans for tomorrow night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . I wasn thinking of maybe going to a movie . Do you want to go with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . What movies were you thinking about going to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you heard of Hot Fuzz ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Isn't the director of that movie the same guy who directed Shaun of the Dead ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the one . It's an actioncomedy . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To be honest , I didn't really like Shaun of the Dead . Besides , I like movies with a happy ending best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was thinking of seeing You , Me and Dupree . It's a typical Hollywood blockbuster .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Isn't that the chick flick with Kate Hudson and Owen Wilson ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I suppose you wouldn't want to see that , huh ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . Do you like biographical / drama films ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It depends on who the film is about . Which movie did you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anne Hathaway is in a new movie called Becoming Jane which is based on a true story about Jane Austen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds fantastic ! What time is it playing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's on at 8 pm at the Phoenix Theatres . I have a membership there , so I can book the tickets ahead of time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . Shall I meet you there around 7 forty-five tomorrow night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds good . I'll see you then !
segments.speaker: S2
